SEARCH
Package BusinessLayer

Class User

java.lang.Object
BusinessLayer.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user in the system with properties like username, name, password, and role. It provides methods for user authentication and login status.

      public boolean login(String inputUsername, String inputPassword)
      Performs user login authentication.
      Parameters:
      inputUsername - The input username for authentication.
      inputPassword - The input password for authentication.
      Returns:
      True if the provided credentials are valid, otherwise false.

    • authenticate

      public boolean authenticate(String username, String password, String tableName)
      Authenticates the user using the provided username, password, and table name.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for authentication.
      password - The password for authentication.
      tableName - The table name for database operations.
      Returns:
      True if the authentication is successful, otherwise false.
